bio: Usapyon has transformed into a demon and calls himself “Demon King,” but he’s only a “li’l devil.” He’s ready to hit the streets to look for sweets!

soultimate.name: Bunny Beam
soultimate.description: Fires a thick beam blast, dealing heavy damage.

skill.effect: Increases the power of X button moves by 40%.
skill.name: Xtreme!

name: Demon King Usapyon
